column1: Bank was raised by the Plaintiff in October 1999 nor did the Defendants seek to assure
the Plaintiff that the right of the Plaintiff to use and enjoy the premises will not be
affected, thus leaving the status of the lease in suspense. This uncertainty continued
until May 2001 when the aforementioned payment of Rs. 125,000 is said to have been
made. Although by this time, action had already been instituted by the Plaintiff, the
Defendants did not  make  any effort  to inform the Plaintiff that  the payments have
been  regularized  and  that  the  Plaintiff  can  carry  out  the  business  of  operating  a
